reviewText: I thought it was great when I was a kid. Now it is okay. I just feel like it was confusing Zip and Lady Frenzy. It just seemed odd. And the whole girl friend thing ended. I just think it did not have staying power. I liked watching the Mario Brothers cartoons too but that is just me.
would love to own this series on DVD
Ahh, Ziv is the MAN!  I loved this when I was younger!  I would have given my left leg for some 3d glasses!
I loved this show back in the 90's when it was running on Fox at either 830am or 230pm they need to release the series on dvd
